Skills:
HVAC System Design: Proficiency in designing HVAC systems, including calculating heating and cooling loads, selecting equipment, ductwork design, and specifying ventilation requirements.
AutoCAD and HVAC Design Software: Competence in using computer-aided design (CAD) software like AutoCAD and HVAC-specific software for system modeling and design.
Mechanical Engineering: Strong knowledge of mechanical engineering principles, thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and heat transfer to design efficient HVAC systems.
Energy Efficiency: Understanding and implementation of energy-efficient HVAC technologies and practices to minimize environmental impact and reduce operating costs.
Codes and Standards: Familiarity with local and international HVAC codes, standards, and regulations to ensure compliance with safety and environmental requirements.
Project Management: Project management skills to effectively plan, organize, and execute HVAC projects, including budgeting, scheduling, and resource allocation.
